title: Tiffany.093100006.Final
name: Tiffany.093100006.Final
description:
Final Project Description
Cartoon and Anime Expo in Guangzhou and Hong Kong 
The animation industry develops a lot these several years in Guangzhou and Hong Kong.  This project will show what places in Guangzhou and Hong Kong are usually used to holding Cartoon and Anime Expos.  
It includes description of different expos, such as their logos, pictures and links of official websites.  You can see them via a tour.

properties.name: Pazhou Convention & Exhibition Center
properties.description: The biggest exhibition center in Asia, Guangzhou Pazhou International Convention Exhibition Center has a strong intention to be the leader of the world. After achieving the third phase project in 2008 fall, it will surpass the scale of any other centers and become the largest in the world. The YACA(Yong Animation and Comic Association) Animation Expo will be held in here every 1st May~3re May. YACA's Expo is famons with its Cosplay Competition. There are more than 50 cosplay big groups come to YACA's Cosplay Competition. They are from all over China, also include Taiwan and HongKong, Macau. In addition, many Non - competitor will also cosplay during the Expo. Some famous Manga Autograph Session will be held in these days. You can buy many animation related products here. For more information, you can click and see the website of YACAhttp://www.yaca.cn/

properties.name: Guangzhou Jinhan Exhibition Centre
properties.description:
Located in the heart of Guangzhou city, the hub of all political, economical, cultural and communication activities & events; Guangzhou Jinhan Exhibition Center is China's leading exhibition center. 
Different from YACA, the ACG Expo(Animation & Comic & Game) is held in 1st Oct.~ 5th Oct. every year.  Although you are not a professional cosplayer you can join in and have fun.  If you are in cosplay dress you will have a chance to get a free entrance ticket. The photo is what I cosplay in 2010.  I meet many friends and I was sooo happy!

properties.name: ACG in HongKong
properties.description: ACGHK is the perfect platform for sales and business opportunities in the big wave of creative industry & digital entertainment development. As the most popular summer camival in Hong Kong, ACGHK is packed with the best selection of animation, comincs, games, toys ,limited edition collectibles, and a variety of hit-hot performance and activities to keep spirits high.

properties.name: Convention Exhibition Centre to Wanchai Sport Ground
